title: Antique House Very Close To The Swimming Beach - LIP 020
details: LIP-020 Only 40 minutes away from Galle Fort and very close to the swimming beaches of Ahanagama lies this stunning well maintained antique house built on 50 perches of land. A quiet and calm area within 5 minutes’ walk to the main road this house offers 6 bedrooms, a living area, a kitchen, office room and library. This area has always attracted many tourists and is close to many amenities such as Ayurveda massages, fruit and vegetable markets and beaches. The garden is well maintained with mature trees and lawn, making this a very tranquil and relaxing piece of land ready to be transformed into a beautiful holiday home. Municipal water and the electricity are connected to the property.
